about_the_game:
Nitronauts is a 2-6 player couch/online multiplayer party game fusing classic Bomberman-like mechanics with explosive new twists. Battle across nine unique stages with an arsenal of wacky items & power-ups. Gather your friends and let the bombs do the talking!

Key Features

  • 2-6 players: online or local multiplayer

  • 9 unique stages: each brings it's own twist designed to test your strategy and adaptability

  • 19 power-ups: Use Tanks, Cluster Bombs, Laser Fences and more to command the battle

  • 3 game modes: Battle Royale, King of the Hill, and Territory. Team up or play solo.

  • AI bots: Compete with or against AI bots.

  • Ghosts mode: Death isn't the end - keep playing for a chance of revenge!

Bombs away!

Nitronauts delivers a heart-pounding blend of strategy and chaos, where every match is an explosive test of wit and reflexes. Combining the thrill of spontaneous strategy with the satisfaction of perfectly timed explosions, every game offers a new opportunity to outsmart and outblast your opponents. Master the unique challenges of nine diverse stages, all designed to keep you on your toes and your opponents on the edge. Whether testing your luck in the Casino or navigating the treacherous terrain of the Desert, each stage challenges your ability to think quickly and act decisively.

Ready to dominate the competition and prove yourself as the ultimate Nitronaut? Ignite the battlefield and master your strategy to emerge victorious!

Disclaimers

  • Only one player can use the keyboard per computer, so playing locally requires controllers for the other players

  • Nitronauts is a multiplayer game, there is no singleplayer mode and the AI is average at best. Make sure to bring a friend or two!
